about_the_game:
Are you a Fan of Portal, Half-Life or Puzzle Games in General? This is the Game For You!

A 3D Puzzle Platformer Story Game about Manipulating Colours and Machines to Solve Puzzles . Adventure into a Post-Apocalyptic World of Mystery and Adventure! Together with the Robot Companions you meet along the Journey, you must find a way to Freedom!



  • Combine Colours to form new Colours!
  • Split Colours into their Constituents!
  • Solve mind-bending puzzles in an expansive post-apocalyptic world
  • Meet many funny and charming robot characters!
  • Uncover the dark truth behind a dystopian world of dead robots
  • 5 Chapters, 5 Locations, 5 Characters, 1 Journey, are you ready?

This game is in a demo state! The demo currently only features chapter 1!
